revision.text:
'''Protein''' is a consumable item which can be purchased from each [[Region|region's]] League, or traded for [[Berries]] with the [[Berry Master]] of each region from [[Johto]] onwards. It can be fed to a Pokémon to increase the amount of attack that Pokémon gains by 1 per protein per hatch. Each Pokémon can consume a total of 5 proteins per unlocked region. =How to Use= Go to Start Menu > Items > Item Bag, select the protein and select a Pokémon to use it on. Once used, the effect is permanent and cannot be removed by any means. =New Efficiency= Below is a list of the most efficient Pokémon to breed after they have been fed the max amount of proteins for that region unlock. The first table for each region ignores non-native damage reduction and event Pokémon. The second (collapsed) table takes those into account and is suggested for use at the beginning of a new region. ==== Kanto ==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" style="text-align:right" ! '''Protein''' is a consumable item which can be purchased from each [[Region|region's]] League, or traded for [[Berries]] with the [[Berry Master]] of each region from [[Johto]] onwards. It can be fed to a Pokémon to increase the amount of attack that Pokémon gains by 1 per protein per hatch. Each Pokémon can consume a total of 5 proteins per unlocked region. =How to Use= Go to Start Menu > Items > Item Bag, select the protein and select a Pokémon to use it on. Once used, the effect is permanent and cannot be removed by any means. =New Efficiency= Below is a list of the most efficient Pokémon to breed after they have been fed the max amount of proteins for that region unlock. The first table for each region ignores non-native damage reduction and event Pokémon. The second (collapsed) table takes those into account and is suggested for use at the beginning of a new region. ==== Kanto ==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" style="text-align:right" ! '''Protein''' is a consumable item which can be purchased from each [[Region|region's]] League, or traded for [[Berries]] with the [[Berry Master]] of each region from [[Johto]] onwards. It can be fed to a Pokémon to increase the amount of attack that Pokémon gains by 1 per protein per hatch. Each Pokémon can consume a total of 5 proteins per unlocked region. =How to Use= Go to Start Menu > Items > Item Bag, select the protein and select a Pokémon to use it on. Once used, the effect is permanent and cannot be removed by any means. =New Efficiency= Below is a list of the most efficient Pokémon to breed after they have been fed the max amount of proteins for that region unlock. The first table for each region ignores non-native damage reduction and event Pokémon. The second (collapsed) table takes those into account and is suggested for use at the beginning of a new region. ==== Kanto ==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" style="text-align:right" !
